Poor Steve... He's done gone to college and started running with the
wrong croud. ;-b
ROFLOL
Great site thanks for sending it in. I was wondering how he was
doing.
Tracy

messages.subject: Steve Burns from Blues Clues
messages.msgSnippet: I am furiously trying to skim and catch up on all this mail that snuck into my box  Add me to the do-not-like-Joe list, I don t like the new version with
messages.messageBody:
I am furiously trying to skim and catch up on all this mail that snuck into
my box <g>
Add me to the do-not-like-Joe list, I don't like the new version with songs
that aren't the same. And I wanted to share Steve's website, I checked it
out one evening and was ROFL. He has a film clip on how to get on a kids tv,
funny pics and the whole tone of his site just hits my funny bone. He is
singing in a band now....

<A HREF="http://www.steveswebpage.com/">http://www.steveswebpage.com/</A>

Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/index.html">UNO Unschoolers Network of Ohio</A>
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/hometour3.html">Ang's Virtual Home Tour Part 3</A> (the homeschooling room)
